songs.lyrics:
Don't give up, keep on tryin
Don't give up, you can fight it
Resist the urge, you're not dyin'
I've got hope for a new horizon

Baby i can see you crying
No, you're not better off dyin'
My love for you is timeless
To me you'll always be a diamond

You're amazing
You drive me crazy
Ain't an occasion
Ain't no replacin' you

I'm always stayin'
And girl im prayin'
That i'm not wastin' time
When i've been waitin' x2

Don't give up, keep on tryin
Don't give up, you can fight it
Resist the urge, you're not dyin'
I've got hope for a new horizon
songs.title: A word of advice
